subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Women and Girls
Models (Professional)
lead_paragraph: Poised and photogenic, Tour hostesses have landed the high-profile job of handing prizes to riders at the finish line of each stage.
snippet: Poised and photogenic, Tour hostesses have landed the high-profile job of handing prizes to riders at the finish line of each stage.
